meanings.definition: To encircle with or as if with wheels.
meanings.sent1: The children enwheel the toy car around the room.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck will enwheel the packages to your doorstep.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy tried to enwheel itself with a hula hoop.
meanings.sent4: The dancers enwheel around the stage, creating a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The giant Ferris wheel enwheels the amusement park skyline.

meanings.definition: To move or convey on wheels.
meanings.sent1: The workers enwheel the heavy crates onto the truck.
meanings.sent2: The wheelchair helps people enwheel themselves easily.
meanings.sent3: The chef enwheels the dessert cart to each table with flair.
meanings.sent4: The train enwheels passengers to their destinations swiftly.
meanings.sent5: The skateboard enwheels down the street with speed and grace.
